name: All Good Things
overview: All Good Things was the fourth release from Classic Game Creations. It is a compilation cartridge, comprised of clones of four earlier games and a bonus hidden fifth game. Contains: Space Invaders Part 2 Rockaroids Spike's Water Balloons Vectris (aka Vectrex Blocks) 23 Matches At the time of its release, All Good Things was the very first 16K cartridge for the Vectrex.
